title: Study of heterogeneous chemistry and photochemistry of single sea-spray aerosols containing Hg(II) in air using optical trapping – Raman spectroscopy
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, 4,911-924
DOI: 10.1039/D4EA00053F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yukai Ai, Chuji Wang, Yong-Le Pan, Gorden Videen
The heterogeneous chemical reaction happens on the surface of the optically suspended sea-spray aerosol particle and is monitored via the single-particle Raman spectroscopy.
